ProductInfo.Features:
This phone is unlocked and can be used with any SIM card. No activation required (check carrier frequency requirements)
3G EURO Standard, Quad Band 850/900/1800/1900 Unlocked/Sim Free
3.5mm Stereo Jack, 8+ Megapixel Camera, A2DP, Bluetooth, Calendar, Camera, Candy Bar Form, Edge, Email Client, FM Radio
In addition there are preloaded applications for social networking sites like Facebook, Youtube and Twitter
The internal memory of this gadget is going to be of 75MB but you will be able to expend it up to 16GB
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Ericsson Vivaz U5i (Silver) Sim Free / Unlocked, International Version with No Warranty
